column2: AbbVie drug shows promise against difficult type of breast cancer Dec 13 Women with an especially deadly type of breast cancer who received a treatment regimen containing an experimental AbbVie Inc drug prior to surgery are likely to have a significantly better response than those who get a standard chemotherapy regimen
column3: according to data from a clinical trial.
